com.appscend.hub

Class KRHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.hub.KRHub
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    APSMediaPlayer

    public class KRHub
extends java.lang.Object
    A KRHub object can easily become a container of references to other objects or classes, organized in groups. To be able to register themselves with a KRHub, objects must implement the KRAdapter protocol. Within a single group there can not be more objects that declare the same type.
    Author:
    Appscend

    • Method Detail

      • adapterForType

        public java.lang.Object adapterForType(java.lang.String type)
        Returns an object of the specified type, if such an object is currently registered in the default group.
        Parameters:
        type - The required object type.
        Returns:
        An object if any is registered, null otherwise.

      • adapterForTypeInGroup

        public java.lang.Object adapterForTypeInGroup(java.lang.String type,
                                              java.lang.String group)
        Returns an object of the specified type, if such an object is currently registered in the specified group.
        Parameters:
        type - The required object type.
        group - The required group.
        Returns:
        An object if any is registered, null otherwise.

      • adaptersForGroup

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> adaptersForGroup(java.lang.String group)
        Returns the list of available registered objects for a specified group.
        Parameters:
        group - The required group.
        Returns:
        A dictionary containing all objects registered for the required group. The dictionary keys are the types, as specified by the objects.

      • registerAdapter

        public void registerAdapter(java.lang.Object adapter)
        Registers a new adapter to the default group.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The adapter to be registered. The object needs to implement KRAdapter.

      • registerAdapterInGroup

        public void registerAdapterInGroup(java.lang.Object adapter,
                                   java.lang.String group)
        Registers a new adapter to a specific group
        Parameters:
        adapter - The adapter to be registered. The object needs to implement KRAdapter.
        group - The group to register the adapter into.

      • registerClass

        public void registerClass(java.lang.Class<?> _class,
                          java.lang.String type)
        Registers a class to the default group, under a specific type. Upon requesting a new object from this type from the default group, a new object of the registered class will be instantiated and returned.
        Parameters:
        _class - The class to register
        type - The type of the registered class.

      • registerClassInGroup

        public void registerClassInGroup(java.lang.Class<?> _class,
                                 java.lang.String group,
                                 java.lang.String type)
        Registers a class to a specific group and a specific type. Upon requesting a new object from this group and type, a new object of the registered class will be instantiated and returned.
        Parameters:
        _class - The class to register.
        group - The group to register the call into.
        type - The type of the registered class.
